name: Control Takeover
description:
You from an alternate universe are playing this game right now. This causes the timeline to break and mess with YOUR universe. Alternate you wants YOU to lose the game as YOU play. So you take control of YOUR game, and try to make YOU lose. 

 Avoid falling blocks while fighting with the controls of the almost uncontrollable character! Try to survive yourself if you can!

Good luck! Both of you!

Theme: Colors

Limitation: You Are Your Own Enemy

A, D or arrow keys to go

SPACE to jump and dash

When the character is red, you from an alternate universe has control over him. Press SPACE 5 times to take the control back!

Headphones recommended!

Full controller support!

Download the game for better experience!

Music was made by myself
